name: DeleteEmptyChunks
description:
Delete chunks which contain no player entities, config radius & paving detection

Based on DestroyEmptyChunks 0.0.5 by darkfrei

	v0.1.0 Backported bugfixes from DestroyEmptyChunks 0.2.1
	       Allowed for paving other than concrete
	v0.0.7 Initial Release
title: Delete Empty Chunks
